code:
```mermaid
---
config:
  theme: redux-color
  look: neo
---

sequenceDiagram
    actor User as User
    participant WebUI as WebUI
    participant Server as Server
    participant Database as Database
    User ->>+ WebUI : 1. Access product list
    WebUI ->>+ Server: 2. GET / products{}
    Server ->> +Database : 3. Get product list
    Database -->>- Server: 4. Return product list
    Server -->>- WebUI : 5. 200 / {meta, product list}
    WebUI -->>- User: 6. Display product list
    User->>+ WebUI: 7. Upload new product
    WebUI->+Server: 8. POST / add-product{product data}
    Server ->>+Database : 9. Add new product
    alt Is product exist?
        Database -->>- Server: 10. Return error message
        Server -->>- WebUI : 11. 403 / {message}
        WebUI -->>- User: 12. Display error message
    else Can add new product?
        Database -->> Server: 10. Return product detail
        Server -->> WebUI : 11. 200 / {meta, product detail}
        WebUI -->> User: 12. Display successful message
    end
    User->>+ WebUI: 13. Edit a product
    WebUI->>+Server: 14. PUT / edit-product{product data}
    Server ->> +Database : 15. Update product
    Database -->>- Server: 16. Return updated product detail
    Server -->>- WebUI : 17. 200 / {meta, product detail}
    WebUI -->>- User: 18. Display successful message
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
